name: Show Training Statistics
description: Display current training progress and accuracy

query.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN gm_response IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as processed, SUM(CASE WHEN gm_response IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending, SUM(CASE WHEN intent = expected_intent THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as correct, SUM(CASE WHEN intent != expected_intent AND intent IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as incorrect FROM query_logs WHERE is_training_data = TRUE
